tool_description: Whois Lookup API in Json or Xml format that allows users to retrieve domain registration information.

api_list.name: NsLookup
api_list.description: NsLookup queries the specified DNS server and retrieves the requested records associated with the provided domain name, including information like the domain nameâ€™s IP addresses.

required_parameters.name: domain
